full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offers
## Solicitation Number
WS4474016878

## Description
To provide geographically zone based Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of Coffee, juice products, state of the art equipment dispensing machines, and maintenance services on an as and when requested basis.

## Zones and Areas of Delivery
-   Southern Ontario
-   Central Ontario
-   North Western Ontario
-   North Eastern Ontario
-   National Capital Region
-   Eastern Ontario

## Details
-   Each offeror may submit up to two (2) Standing Offers per zone, one for the Coffee products and one for the juice products.
-   Offerors must submit pricing for 100% of the line items for either coffee or juice or both for each zone they are providing an offer.

## Documents
-   Details of tender can be found on the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19062910?extsite=MTkwNjI5MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website.
-   Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
-   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 25, 2024 at 14:00 EDT.

## Procurement Method
This is a competitive procurement - open bidding.

## Evaluation Criteria
-   Lowest Price

## Exclusion
This procurement is not restricted on the basis of any country or origin.

## Trade Agreements Involved
-   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
-   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
-   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
-   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
-   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
-   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
-   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
-   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
-   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
-   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
-   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
-   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Start Date
None

## End Date
None

## Amendment Number
5

## Contracting Entity
Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC
